name: Ghost Journey (Zoi, 20wontons, ercngyen, sogg_y, Haley Vlahos, Charlie Xu, dnajerab)
name_original: Ghost Journey (Zoi, 20wontons, ercngyen, sogg_y, Haley Vlahos, Charlie Xu, dnajerab)
description:
This is a movement-based 2D platformer where the player will avoid obstacles to move to the end goal in a semi-narrative-based game.

Controls

WASD to move

SPACE to jump

SHIFT to dash

LEFT MOUSE to continue

Credits

Team Lead: Zoi Meaders

Game Designers: Aung Khant | Charlie Xu

Programmers: Axel Sorenson | Geo Li | Hyejeong (Alice) Shin | Lee Austin Uy

Artists: Kiara Coleman | Zoi Meaders

Audio Designers: Antoine Nguyen | Emma McCarthy

Writer: Eric Nguyen

UI/UX: Joanna Wan

Voice Actress (Cinnamon): Haley Vlahos

Producer: Diego Najera
